Description: Executive email account compromised. Fraudulent transfers totaling ZMW 180,000 made to external accounts. Multiple follow-up attempts detected.
SuspectInformation: Account access from foreign IP addresses. Credential harvesting phishing emails sent.

Description: Healthcare facility suffered data breach. Patient records compromised. Ransom demand received. Patient data (names, medical history, insurance) exposed.
SuspectInformation: Ransomware group known as 'CyberZulu'. Bitcoin payment address provided.
